name: Zomteria
description: In 2245, an apocalypse broke out from a military-funded laboratory. It soon spread out and infected almost the entire world. You were a volunteer for the lab 20 years ago, slept in a hibernation pod until you were supposed to have experimented, but you woke up from the pod 20 years later in a deadly world. What happened? How are you gonna survive the post-apocalypse?
